title: Body Double
description:
Jake comes home to find his girlfriend with another man and has to find a new place to live in between his acting workshops and his job as a vampire in a B-movie. Another fellow acting student offers Jake a great place to stay for a short time while he is away. This is where the movie begins. It is a Thriller full of Suspense, Drama, and Sexy Scenes. This movie is most definitely a guy movie of the first water, and some women will enjoy it also for different reasons. This is one of   Melanie Griffith early movies. She plays a porn star Holy Body. Her role is humor not porn
